mapper.select: select uam.user_award_id, uam.create_time, uam.used_status, uam.point, buyer.user_id, buyer.name, s.shop_id, s.shop_name, a.award_id, a.award_name, operator.user_id as operator_id, operator.name as operator_name from tb_user_award_map uam, tb_person_info buyer, tb_shop s, tb_award a, tb_person_info operator where uam.user_id=buyer.user_id and uam.shop_id=s.shop_id and uam.award_id=a.award_id and uam.operator_id=operator.user_id and user_award_id=#{userAwardId}
